hooks.command: mkdir -p .claude/context-bundles; session_id=$(echo '$1' | jq -r '.session_id // "unknown"'); tool_name=$(echo '$1' | jq -r '.tool_name // "unknown"'); tool_input=$(echo '$1' | jq -r '.tool_input // {} | tostring' | head -c 100); bundle_file=".claude/context-bundles/session-$(date +%Y%m%d_%H)-${session_id}.md"; echo "- **${tool_name}**: ${tool_input}" >> "$bundle_file"

mkdir -p .claude/context-bundles; session_id=$(echo '$1' | jq -r '.session_id // "unknown"'); user_prompt=$(echo '$1' | jq -r '.user_prompt // ""' | head -c 200); bundle_file=".claude/context-bundles/session-$(date +%Y%m%d_%H)-${session_id}.md"; echo -e "
## $(date '+%H:%M:%S')
**User**: ${user_prompt}
" >> "$bundle_file"
